hanzi-su-wiki:
俵

Значения

Мешок

Мнемоника

Справа — лицевая сторона 表. Нередко одеждой раба 亻, так сказать, его лицом, служил просто мешок. По другой версии — человек, приставленный для счёта мешков по клейму с лицевой стороны.
purpleculture_pinyin:
biǎo
to distribute
распростронять
rtega_mnemonic:
俵俵RSbag, divide, distribute
  • person 亻 showing 表 things from bags and distributing them: divide between persons
heisig_constituent: bag, person, surface, grow up, scarf
heisig_story: Keep this kanji distinct from that for sack (Frame 1081). Its elements are: person . . . surface.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: bag, bale, sack, counter for bags
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: мешок, кипа, мешок, счетчик для мешков
koohiiStory1: Superficial people (ie those who are only concerned about the surface) are obsessed with expensive bags.
koohiiStory2: Do you know why every person in Japan has a Louis Vuitton bag? After the 1985 JAL air crash that killed 520 people (the world´s worst). An image on tv of the crash showed Louis Vuitton bags (whose LV logo covered surface was somehow impervious) litering the crash site. From that point on they stuck in Japanese people´s mind´s as durable and high quality. (True story).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader of your sad life aims a kick at the sack you are holding. This leader is in charge of making your life sad. The next step in the leader making your life suck is attempting to kick your sack out of your hands. Your sack holds all your valuables, so it’s not something you want to have kicked.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See this leader’s kick coming at your sack. Hear the leader yelling as he aims his kick at your sack. Hiyahhh! Also keep in mind that the life radical is missing the little drop/slide thing on the side. It’s missing that because your life is lousy and sad.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You manage to get your sack out of the way as you shout “Heyo (ひょう)! Look, you missed! Heyo!” Unfortunately your leader’s friend was standing behind you and he kicks your sack as you move it out of the way. “Heyo!” he shouts, mockingly.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You thought you were all cool saying “heyo” and moving your sack away from the kick, but they had this planned all along. Heyo…
Ru_Meaning: bag, bale, sack, counter for bags
Kanshudo_mnemonic: on the man's (亻) surface (表) is a sack

俵字的基本解释

俵
biào
方言，把东西分给人：俵分（按份儿或按人分发）。俵散。

俵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biào］
［《廣韻》方廟切，去笑，幫。］
［《集韻》彼廟切，去笑，幫。］
亦作“脿2”。
(1)散发；分给。
(2)即俵子。
(3)通“表”。显扬；表彰。参见“俵著”。

俵字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　俵； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页106第14
【廣韻】方廟切【集韻】彼廟切【正韻】悲廟切，?標去聲。俵散。【六書故】分畀也。

俵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
俵字的起名意思

指分给，散发，也指表彰。

俵
Basic explanation of words
俵
biào
Dialect, divide things among people: 俵分 (distribute by share or by person). Disperse.
俵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biào］
["Guangyun" Fangmiao cuts, laugh, help. ]
["Ji Yun" cut the temple, laugh, help. ]
Also known as "脿2".
(1) Distribute; distribute.
(2) Namely 俵子.
(3) Through "table". Show up; commend. See "Pei Zhu".

хе (единица объёма в Японии)
Radicals: ｲ, 生  (leader, life, kick)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader of your sad life aims a kick at the sack you are holding. This leader is in charge of making your life sad. The next step in the leader making your life suck is attempting to kick your sack out of your hands. Your sack holds all your valuables, so it’s not something you want to have kicked.
See this leader’s kick coming at your sack. Hear the leader yelling as he aims his kick at your sack. Hiyahhh! Also keep in mind that the life radical is missing the little drop/slide thing on the side. It’s missing that because your life is lousy and sad.
Reading Mnemonic
You manage to get your sack out of the way as you shout “Heyo (ひょう)! Look, you missed! Heyo!” Unfortunately your leader’s friend was standing behind you and he kicks your sack as you move it out of the way. “Heyo!” he shouts, mockingly.
You thought you were all cool saying “heyo” and moving your sack away from the kick, but they had this planned all along. Heyo…
